name: Sauteed Peppers, Onions And Rosemary
keywords: green pepper, onion, rosemary, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary leaves or 1 teaspoon dried
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Saute onions in hot oil in nonstick pan over medium-high heat until soft and golden, about 10 minutes. Add peppers and rosemary. Cook until peppers soften and start to brown, 15 to 20 minutes.
Add vinegar, salt and pepper, reduce heat to low and cover pan. Continue cooking until vegetables are very soft, about 10 minutes longer.
